comment: Love the new playlist discovery feature! It really understands my music taste.
Audio quality is excellent, but sometimes the app crashes on my phone.
The social sharing features are amazing! Love sharing my favorite tracks.
Good music selection but the search function could be more accurate.
Customer support was super helpful when I had billing questions.
Love the offline download feature for commuting!
App is too slow to load especially during peak hours.
The curated playlists for different moods are perfect!
Great variety of international music but need more local artists.
Subscription price is reasonable but ads on free tier are too frequent.
The new dark mode is exactly what I was looking for!
Keeps asking me to rate songs I've never heard before.
Love that I can create collaborative playlists with friends.
Good app overall but battery drain is quite high.
The lyrics feature is amazing for karaoke nights!
